ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Wahoo!
ygData.msgSnippet: They go down everynow and then for maintainance purposes.  In fact they have not been shut down for a while as of late and some probelms where beginning to
ygData.messageBody:
They go down everynow and then for maintainance purposes. In fact they have
not been shut down for a while as of late and some probelms where beginning
to develop i.e. Guildtags losses and such. Powering them down will clear up
a few issues. Hey congrats on Level 7 your on your way. =)

Duhase

-----Original Message-----
From: m.peanut1@... [mailto:m.peanut1@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 16, 2000 6:23 PM
To: Everquest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Wahoo!


From: m.peanut1@...

Forget the level 6 wizard, she's lvl 7 now, and it sucks that the servers
are down....but, i wish I was in a guild. Oh, and I WORSHIP Lackey, what
can you say, she's the best...




"Wizards and Clerics are by far the best class in EverQuest and we all
know that High Elves rule the world."
